item.title: ‘Lego Masters Jr.,’ Hosted by Kelly Osbourne, Arrives Tonight: How to Watch the Premiere Online
item.description: Lego-loving youngters will finally get their turn at building their own Lego masterpieces in the junior spinoff of “Lego Masters,” premiering Monday night at 8 p.m. ET/PT. Cable-cutters ca
